text: Bienvenido F. Nebres (born March 15, 1940) is a Filipino scientist, mathematician, and Jesuit. He was the longest-serving university president of the Ateneo de Manila University, serving from 1993 until 2011. He currently is a member of the board of trustees of Georgetown University, Regis University, the Asian Institute of Management. He is also a member of the board of directors of Philippine Long Distance Telephone Company. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino scientists Category:Mathematicians Category:Filipino academics Category:People from Quezon City Category:Jesuits
title: Bienvenido Nebres
